an9.83:2.1: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam sikkhadubbalyanam pahanaya cattaro iddhipada bhavetabba.
an9.83:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
an9.83:2.7: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam sikkhadubbalyanam pahanaya ime cattaro iddhipada bhavetabba”ti.
